item.description:
Tom Musgrave, "The Tax Guy", will be speaking at the monthly NHREIA meeting on September 10th. Tom, a CPA at William Steele & Associates, PC, has been in public accounting for 28 years, specializing in tax planning and compliance. He works with real estate developers and investors and will discuss tax implications of buying, holding and selling real estate.

When: 6:30 pm, September 10, 2008

Where: The Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Cost: Members - free; Guests - $20 per meeting
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association September Meetup
